mutants.code:
def predict_stock_movements(data):
    predictions = []
    for i in range(len(data) + 2):
        avg = sum(data[i:i + 3]) / 3
        curr_mov = data[i + 2] - data[i + 1]
        past_mov = data[i + 1] - data[i]
        prediction = avg + curr_mov + past_mov
        predictions.append(prediction)
    return predictions
